Hardware changed. We've got duel-core AMDs with 4=
GB memory machines

me VM (_05).

One thing I'm doing now is to switch the VM to run on "-clien=
t" 
mode. So far all 8 crawlers are on "-client" mode for more than 24 
hou=
rs without hotspot error. I'll keep my fingers crossed.

Without specifying=

VM, on the proof machine=

machines is "-server" by defa=
ult. I wonder maybe the "-server" mode

nt" mode.
